pr_title: Remove travis warning about upper/lower char

timeline.message:
NF: return directly from deepCloneInto

This avoid a warning

Cases default

Travis state that US and no information should be avoided. Instead I use root for internal (sql, comparing deck name, checking whether an
extension is apkg, anki2, ....) and getDefault() for everything facing the user, such as title of section, media file

timeline.bodyText: This makes both branches equal, which was not the intention. This should be Locale.getDefault || Locale.ROOT (or US)
timeline.author: david-allison-1
